text: Tara tomake gharighanta sanbandhe jijnasa karache -- kakhana ta ghatabe. Balo -- ''era jnana abasya'i rayeche amara prabhura kache, era samaya sanbandhe ta prakasa karate pare na tini chara ke'u. E ati gurutara byapara mahakasamandale o prthibite, e ese parabe na tomadera upare atarkite chara.’’ Tara tomake jijnasa karache yena tumi'i e bisaye agrahi. Balo -- ''era jnana alabat allah‌ra kache, kintu adhikansa loka'i jane na.’’
